docs.abstract: The health of your mouth appears to influence your body's overall health.
docs.lead_paragraph: It's long been known that oral health is an important indicator for the body's overall health. Now new research suggests gum disease may predict whether you develop diabetes.
docs.snippet: The health of your mouth appears to influence your body's overall health.

keywords.value: Center for Science in the Public Interest

docs.lead_paragraph: As with any product used to excess, consumers often wonder about the health consequences of caffeine.
docs.snippet: As with any product used to excess, consumers often wonder about the health consequences of caffeine.

headline.print_headline: J. Murdoch Ritchie, 83; Used Toxin to Trace Nerve Impulses
headline.seo: J. Murdoch Ritchie, 83, Yale Biophysicist, Is Dead
headline.main: J. Murdoch Ritchie, Who Used Toxin to Trace Nerve Impulses, Is Dead at 83

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Ritchie, a biophysicist at Yale, famously asked the Central Intelligence Agency to share with scientists its supply of the neurotoxin he was using in his studies.
docs.snippet: Dr. Ritchie, a biophysicist at Yale, famously asked the Central Intelligence Agency to share with scientists its supply of the neurotoxin he was using in his studies.

headline.main: J. Murdoch Ritchie, 83; Used Toxin to Trace Nerve Impulses

docs.abstract: J Murdoch Ritchie, biophysicist at Yale who used potent neurotoxin to help trace way nerve cells conduct impulses and who famously asked Central Intelligence Agency to share its supply of poison with scientists, dies at age 83; photo (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: J. Murdoch Ritchie, a biophysicist at Yale who used a potent neurotoxin derived from shellfish to help trace the way nerve cells conduct electrical impulses and famously asked the Central Intelligence Agency to share its supply of the poison with scientists, died on July 9 in Hamden, Conn. He was 83. Dr. Ritchie's death was confirmed by his family.
docs.snippet: J. Murdoch Ritchie, a biophysicist at Yale who used a potent neurotoxin derived from shellfish to help trace the way nerve cells conduct electrical impulses and famously asked the Central Intelligence Agency to share its supply of the poison with...
